verses.name: Proverbs 16:1
verses.text: The preparations of the heart in man, and the answer of the tongue, is from the Lord.

verses.name: Proverbs 16:2
verses.text: All the ways of a man are clean in his own eyes; but the Lord weigheth the spirits.

verses.name: Proverbs 16:3
verses.text: Commit thy works unto the Lord, and thy thoughts shall be established.

verses.name: Proverbs 16:4
verses.text: The Lord hath made all things for himself: yea, even the wicked for the day of evil.

verses.name: Proverbs 16:5
verses.text: Every one that is proud in heart is an abomination to the Lord: though hand join in hand, he shall not be unpunished.
